_description: Maps legacy field names to DOC-020 canonical field names
_source: DOC-020 Invariants INV-024, INV-025 + data/ JSON analysis

position.note: 16 of 18 files use 'position', 4 files also have 'role'. Canonical: only 'role' allowed.

bio.note: Field exists but is plain string. Canonical spec may require Portable Text.

birthYear.note: Some files use numeric, some string. Normalize to number.

category.note: Field 'category' must become 'sector'. Values also need mapping (see category-mapping.json)

image.note: Single image string → Sanity image reference

services.note: Array of Hebrew strings → should become array of Service references

letterUrl.note: References /documents/*.pdf files — all MISSING from repo. Empty documents/ directory.
